item.title: Communications Support (Video & Photography) - Upwork
item.description:
The Mic Across WI project uses photo and video portraits to explore the ways in which survivors of gendered violence are impacted by policing, mass incarceration, and deportation. At Freedom Action Now our vision is to advance a feminist abolitionist agenda, through which survivors of gendered violence are the antagonists in the ongoing struggle for liberation, with the power to govern, create policies, and shift the material conditions that impact their daily lives.

Skills needed:
- - Video production
- - Video editing
- - Interviewing
- - Photography

The Deliverables:
- - developing video content and photographs for various platforms (Ex: Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and YouTube)

This project will have a fixed budget and will be paid according to milestones met successfully. Example milestones are:
- - Concept Development for video media & print media (We will provide the concept for the content & logos.)  
- - 1st round of refinement
- - 2nd round of refinement


Posted On: June 17, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:People, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing, Photography
Skills: People, Video Editing, Video Production, Photo Editing, Photography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
